page.title: 08HOUSING: Developments
page.content: There are several new estates in the area.In Brandlesholme, such an estate is the Barratt estate that consists of detached individual houses and bungalows, some still under development.Towards Lowercroft there are some recently finished estates. They are expensively priced from Â£45000 to around Â£70000.Just across from our school in Elton, there are some estates that have been recently completed and they will soon be occupied. The western outskirts of the town are dominated by cottage farm houses. They were built around the early 19th Century.Though some houses still survive from the 1760's.This area is built on the slope of a hill. Here there are compact streets built around the 1920's.The area north-west of the town is mainly pre-war terraces.
